txt.en: Lân Mefam is located east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should destroy Mûmak feed bags at Lân Mefam. Destroying them should make the Mûmakil hungry, restless, and difficult to control.
Mûmak feed bags are stored throughout Lân Mefam and should be destroyed.
By destroying the feed sacks you have weakened the usefulness of the Mûmakil to the Haradrim forces.
Lân Mefam is located east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should destroy Mûmak feed bags at Lân Mefam. Destroying them should make the Mûmakil hungry, restless, and difficult to control.
You notice large sacks scattered about Lân Mefam. These must be Mûmak feed bags. Destroying them should make the Mûmakil hungry, restless, and difficult to control.
Destroy Mûmak feed sacks at Lân Mefam
